channel.title: What does everybody want/do during the Holidays?
channel.description:
It's getting close to Christmas, and I'd thought I'd like to share what I'm doing for Christmas.
Well, what I want for Christmas is Kirby's Return to Dreamland for Wii, Portal 2, and $50 in my steam wallet. :smiley:
I'm also having a Party on the evening of Christmas Eve with my Aunts, Uncles, and Cousins complete with Eggnog and Loadsa Good Eats!
So, what are you guys doing for the holidays, especially the devs?

item.title: What does everybody want/do during the Holidays?
item.dc:creator: X_Mastershot_X
item.description:
Maxey:

Are you a Christian, Mastershot?

Religionless. Some of my friends are muslim but I think they commit more sins than me I think.
New year is just another reason to get drunk lol.

Read full topic
item.source: What does everybody want/do during the Holidays?

item.title: What does everybody want/do during the Holidays?
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Christmas eve will be spent at home with my parents, brothers and in-laws. Lots of good noms, cozy socializing and presents at midnight (presents being: exchange money… Parents give their kids €50 each, we give our parents €50 each… Kind of pointless, but there you go).

Christmas day will be spent on visiting forgotten relatives that have not yet died.

New years eve will be spent with friends in Antwerp. Some more good noms, lots of alcohol and a ton of fun in the form of silly games, videogames (albeit silly) and city nightlife post-midnight.

New years day will be spent figuring out what gutter I fell asleep in and then figure out the best way to get back home.

Read full topic
item.source: What does everybody want/do during the Holidays?

item.title: What does everybody want/do during the Holidays?
item.dc:creator: X_Mastershot_X
item.description:
I’m throwing a party in my house. Normally, there are supposed to be gals coming to the party. But of course we , guys screwed that part up. Only a few girls were able to make it so we said fuck it and it’s going to be a 7 men sausagefest this year. They’re good guys, though. It should be fun.

Read full topic
item.source: What does everybody want/do during the Holidays?

item.title: What does everybody want/do during the Holidays?
item.dc:creator: Capt_Quark
item.description:
What I want: Keurig single brew coffee maker, or some Steam games
Going to do: Christmas morning: Have our 4 year old open gifts and see what Santa brought, go to church, then swing by my parent’s house for Christmas turkey and all the fixins.

Read full topic

item.title: What does everybody want/do during the Holidays?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I don’t need any presents, because I am extremely manly and awesome and that’s all I need.

You people are very sad and you have my pity.

Christmas is for the weak minded.

[color=Black]
haha just kidding

item.title: What does everybody want/do during the Holidays?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Gift-exchange in morning, followed by usage of said gifts during cooking of dinner, followed by eating said dinner, followed by tryptophan-induced coma.

As Jesus intended.

item.title: What does everybody want/do during the Holidays?
item.dc:creator: Fuskox
item.description:
Go to my Grandpa’s house and have a family party (Christmas Eve). Stay at home on Christmas day after doing gifts and have fun with what you got.
